history.title: Our History
history.text: In 2008 a branch of Russell James and Company Inc. was established in Howick to provide Bookkeeping, Accounting, Tax, Payroll and Advisory offerings to clients in the KZN Midlands. Our first offices were housed in the Old Howick Falls Hotel until 2016 when we moved into our own premises at 95 Main Street. Through changes brought on by expansion and growth; Russell James and Company changed its name to Baker Tilly JHB Inc. and then to RJCO Howick as it is known now. In 2020 BSH (Bookkeeping Services Howick Pty Ltd) moved into the RJCO offices. The symbiosis between the two companies became apparent, and we decided to join forces under a singular identity: RJCO Howick. This union embodies a perfect synergy and underscores our commitment to providing excellent services to the Howick community, Midlands and beyond. With our shared values of excellence and dedication to client satisfaction, this collaboration ensures a bigger range of accounting, bookkeeping and other solutions to cater to diverse needs.
